resources.string: This app needs access to your camera so you can take pictures.
This app needs access to your location to know where you are.
This app needs access to your sms to read all your great messages.
This app needs access to your contact to know you better

Returned from app settings to MainActivity with the following permissions: 

Camera: %1s 
Location: %2s 
SMS: %3s 
Contacts: %4s
